title: Change snowfall effect color to blue

requirements.summary: Change snowflake color from red to blue in the SnowfallBackground component by modifying the radial gradient color stops in the drawSnowflake function
acceptanceCriteria: The drawSnowflake function uses blue rgba values in the radial gradient instead of red
Snowflakes render with a soft blue glow effect on the canvas
The color change applies to all gradient color stops (center and outer glow)
Animation speed, particle behavior, and accessibility features remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Change the radial gradient color stops in the drawSnowflake function (lines 87-89) from red rgba values to blue rgba values. Replace rgba(255, 0, 0, ...) with rgba(173, 216, 230, ...) for the light blue center glow, and replace rgba(255, 100, 100, ...) with rgba(135, 206, 250, ...) for the sky blue outer glow. Preserve all opacity calculations and gradient structure. Do not modify any other animation parameters, particle behavior, devicePixelRatio handling, or prefers-reduced-motion support.
